Not Started Activities

AssignedDate ActivityTitle Status ProjectName ActivityType Description DueDate
{{activity.assignDate |date}} {{activity.title}} {{activity.status}} {{activity.projectName}} {{activity.activityType}} {{activity.description}} {{activity.dueDate|date}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Activity } from 'src/app/activity/Models/Activity'; import { ActivityService } from 'src/app/activity/Services/activity.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-update-activity', templateUrl: './update-activity.component.html', styleUrls: ['./update-activity.component.css'] }) export class UpdateActivityComponent implements OnInit{ constructor(private service:ActivityService){} projectId:number=4 employeeId:number=15 activities:Activity[]=[]; ngOnInit(): void { this.service.getAllNotStartedActivities(this.projectId,this.employeeId).subscribe((res)=>{ this.activities=res; console.log(res); }) } onChange(activity:Activity){ console.log(activity); } }
